nodeDomain.title: Livebylife Technologies

body.processed: Digital internet products consultancy. Livebylife Technologies believes in programming solutions to build a better experience.

nodeDomain.field_domain_slogan: Life is about change so let's program the wave of change

body.processed:
Welcome to Livebylife Technologies. I'm Matt, I program web things like websites, application programming interfaces (API's), mobile applications, front-end, back-end, internet of things (IoT), data management, reporting and collection. This means I help companies prototype and launch faster.

Life is about change so let's program it ourselves taking advantage of the latest technologies, stacks, libraries, frameworks, and fundamentals let's ride the waves of change.

Why Livebylife Technologies?

Timeliness - I'm a big fan of design sprints and agile methodologies so that every project is completed quickly and professionally.

Quality – I like to measure quality of projects by the “Quality in Use” Model (ISO/IEC 25010:2011) Software Quality Model: Effectiveness, Efficiency, Satisfaction, Safety, Usability

Financially resolute – Expenses for any project can become outrageous if not for budgets. Projects running at budget and have low maintenance expenditures are set up to excel. 

Flexibility – Flexible boundaries within app development to ensure successful execution of projects. I follow the three pillars of project management and product development – Time, Scope, and Cost. Flexibility holds these together to form a quality product. Too rigid a project and the more it resists change will cause it to break under pressure like brittle glass.

Industry Proficiencies      

  • Hospitality & Tourism
  • Construction
  • Small Business / Entrepreneurship
  • Energy and Mining Operations

Book a Free Consultation
